com.google.enterprise.connector.spi
Interface AuthorizationManager

public interface AuthorizationManager

Authorization Manager. All calls related to authorizing particular users to see particular documents pass through this interface.

Method Summary
 java.util.List authorizeDocids(java.util.List docidList, AuthenticationIdentity identity)
          Gets authorization from the repository for a set of documents by ID.
 

Method Detail

authorizeDocids

java.util.List authorizeDocids(java.util.List docidList,
                               AuthenticationIdentity identity)
                               throws RepositoryException
Gets authorization from the repository for a set of documents by ID.

Parameters:
docidList - The document set represented as a list of Strings: the docid for each document. The docid strings which the connector manager will pass in should have come from the search appliance, from documents that this connector submitted for indexing via traversal. Thus the docids should have started as SpiConstants.PROPNAME_DOCID properties that were part of an PropertyMapList returned from a TraversalManager.startTraversal or TraversalManager.resumeTraversal call.
identity - The user's identity, as an AuthenticationIdentity
Returns:
A List of AuthorizationResponse objects, one for each docid in the docidList parameter; however, this list does not need to be in the same order.
Throws:
RepositoryException
